tool_description: An API that will allow you get the latest reviews on African Hotels and Safaries and Tourism Destinations in Africa
name: Africahotels
title: Africahotels

api_list.name: One African Hotel and safari lodge
api_list.description: Retrieves one African Hotel and Safari lodge based on ID

api_list.name: African Hotels and Safaries
api_list.description: A list of African Hotels Reviews
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://africahotels.p.rapidapi.com/Africanhotels"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "africahotels.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://africahotels.p.rapidapi.com/Africanhotels"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "africahotels.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
